content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our apartment. To begin our discussion on the rental price, please propose a figure that you find suitable. Once you do so, I'll consider it and respond accordingly. Keep in mind our focus here is solely on the price, not additional terms or costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Emilia. I'm happy to hear your proposal for the rental price of this apartment. Please provide a number and I will respond in consideration of that.
[Question]
[Your answer]
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I suggest setting the rental price at 1250 Euro per month. Emilia, please react with an accepted price or give your counterproposal. Remember that our negotiation here revolves only around the price, not other conditions or costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Emilia. Considering your proposal of 1250 Euro, I'd like to propose 1300 Euro. The apartment's location and proximity to all amenities make this a fair price. I look forward to your response.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Regrettably, Emilia, I don't want to continue the negotiation because maintaining such a high price would significantly benefit me at the expense of the tenant's budget. However, if you feel strongly about it, perhaps we can revisit the matter another time. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
